Issue.creator: kenzhang
Issue.description: 172.17.0.6:7051: write: connection reset by peer. Error starting Simple chaincode: Error chatting with leader at address=172.17.0.6:7051: rpc error: code = 13 desc = transport: write tcp 172.17.0.1:45933->172.17.0.6:7051: write: connection reset by peer` Based on ~muralisr we are need to package the certs during the registration, which was done in the 0.6 SDK >
